text: José Joaquín de Iturbide y Arregui (February 6, 1739 – November 19, 1825) was the father of Agustín de Iturbide who received the title of Prince of the Union during the First Mexican Empire by the Constituent Congress. Category:1739 deaths Category:1825 deaths Category:Spanish diaspora in Mexico
title: José Joaquín de Iturbide
